rows.label: qst701603_msg0001
rows.name:
Well then... We need to
come up with a strategy to
win the cooking contest.

rows.label: qst701603_msg0002
rows.name: Yes, let's definitely win!

rows.label: qst701603_msg0003
rows.name: Why are you two so fired up...?

rows.label: qst701603_msg0004
rows.name: It's fun, isn't it?

rows.label: qst701603_msg0005
rows.name:
For things like this, if you cater
to the judges' tastes, you'll
probably get a better evaluation.

rows.label: qst701603_msg0006
rows.name: That's true.

rows.label: qst701603_msg0007
rows.name:
The judges are... Maulton-san,
Adel-sama, and Hugo-sama.

rows.label: qst701603_msg0008
rows.name: And, according to Adel-sama...

rows.label: qst701603_msg0009
rows.name:
It seems Morimori-san, who is rumored
to be the number one gourmand in the
capital, will also participate.

rows.label: qst701603_msg0010
rows.name: [ML:Feeling kind=Think ] A gourmand...?

rows.label: qst701603_msg0011
rows.name:
He also said he would
call a few more people.

rows.label: qst701603_msg0012
rows.name:
I don't know everyone's tastes
well, but... Adel likes
Pan-Fried Tartari, right?

rows.label: qst701603_msg0013
rows.name: Pan-Fried Tartari...

rows.label: qst701603_msg0014
rows.name:
The soft and juicy Pan-Fried
Tartari is delicious.

rows.label: qst701603_msg0015
rows.name: Yes, it's exquisite!

rows.label: qst701603_msg0016
rows.name:
I was thinking of making it
sometime. This might be a
good opportunity to try.

rows.label: qst701603_msg0017
rows.name: Yes, yes.

rows.label: qst701603_msg0018
rows.name:
As for the ingredients... Urus
Beastmeat and Rhogul Birdmeat.

rows.label: qst701603_msg0019
rows.name:
Also, Weeping Flour, Nest Extract,
and Barbed Tomatoes would be nice.

rows.label: qst701603_msg0020
rows.name:
Just imagining it, it seems
like we can make a delicious
Pan-Fried Tartari.

rows.label: qst701603_msg0021
rows.name:
Um... Laura-sama, something
just occurred to me...

rows.label: qst701603_msg0022
rows.name: What is it?

rows.label: qst701603_msg0023
rows.name:
It's possible that the
other participants will
think the same way we are.

rows.label: qst701603_msg0024
rows.name:
You mean they might also prepare
Adel's favorite, Pan-Fried Tartari?

rows.label: qst701603_msg0025
rows.name: Yes, that's right.

rows.label: qst701603_msg0026
rows.name:
I plan to make a Pan-Fried Tartari
that's second to none, but...

rows.label: qst701603_msg0027
rows.name:
But if the dishes overlap,
I think the chances of
winning will decrease...

rows.label: qst701603_msg0028
rows.name: How about dessert?

rows.label: qst701603_msg0029
rows.name: Dessert! A great idea!

rows.label: qst701603_msg0030
rows.name: Right!

rows.label: qst701603_msg0031
rows.name: Whose favorite is it?

rows.label: qst701603_msg0032
rows.name: I want to eat it now!

rows.label: qst701603_msg0033
rows.name: Me too!

rows.label: qst701603_msg0035
rows.name: I haven't made many desserts, but...

rows.label: qst701603_msg0036
rows.name: It might not be a bad idea to try...

rows.label: qst701603_msg0037
rows.name: Do you have any good ideas?

rows.label: qst701603_msg0038
rows.name:
I was thinking of using a cake I
saw in Invidia as a reference.

rows.label: qst701603_msg0039
rows.name:
With Cranberry Bells, Ruska
Flour, and Weeping Flour...

rows.label: qst701603_msg0040
rows.name:
And Melosian Honey and Lactonuts,
I think I can make it.

rows.label: qst701603_msg0041
rows.name: That sounds delicious!

rows.label: qst701603_msg0042
rows.name:
Laura-sama... Which one
will you compete with?

rows.label: qst701603_msg0043
rows.name:
Aah... We can only
submit one dish, right?

rows.label: qst701603_msg0044
rows.name:
Shin, which one are you
more confident in?

rows.label: qst701603_msg0046
rows.name:
I think it's the Pan-Fried
Tartari... but I think there's
a chance of winning with either.

rows.label: qst701603_msg0047
rows.name: It's a tough choice...

rows.label: qst701603_msg0048
rows.name:
How about we prepare both
and decide just before?

rows.label: qst701603_msg0049
rows.name: That might be a good idea.

rows.label: qst701603_msg0050
rows.name:
Then, tomorrow, after Shin has
prepared the two dishes, let's
come back to this inn.

rows.label: qst701603_msg0051
rows.name: Yes!

rows.label: qst701603_msg0052
rows.name: Good luck, Shin!

rows.label: qst701603_msg0053
rows.name: Yeah...
